name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 29, a Sichuan University student gave a speech under the national flag, calling on everyone to be brave and united, not to let those who run wild on "our territory" go, and to make sure that the perpetrators are severely punished.
It is reported that the student was later taken away by the school.
It is reported that the reason for the speech was that in a football match held at Sichuan University on the 27th, players from Chengdu Sports University beat up Sichuan University players, causing many injuries. However, Sichuan University did not protect the interests of its students afterwards, which led to strong dissatisfaction among students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 29, a female student from Fujian Agricultural and Forestry Vocational Technical College jumped off a building due to dormitory bullying. Her roommate had cursed her in the group, "Why don't you just die?" It was widely rumored that after the incident, the rest of the roommates who had bullied the deceased were arranged by the school to protect their capital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 29, Dota2 tournament commentator YammerS has been confirmed dead.
In his suicide note, he listed his depression, his family of origin, and the bullying he suffered from the children of China Railway leaders in his childhood, which were the important reasons for his suicide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Errata, the school is Fujian Agricultural Vocational and Technical College, sorry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 29, Xilin Politics and Law released a video titled "Catch! A woman actually publicly insulted the traffic police online as bandits." As a result, the comment area was flooded with netizens supporting the woman.
It is reported that the woman posted a photo of the traffic police checking electric vehicles on her WeChat Moments, saying that the traffic police were bandits. As a result, she was summoned that afternoon and accused of insulting the traffic police and suspected of provoking trouble. As soon as the video was released, it aroused dissatisfaction among netizens, who said, "Why are you scolding me? I hope the authorities will find the reason."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 30, a job posting went viral in the complex. A real estate advertising company was looking for employees, and the requirement was that they would be willing to accept a four-month salary arrears.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
May 30, Beijing.
A netizen passed by Sitong Bridge and found that the road sign of Sitong Bridge had been removed from the bridge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent supplement
According to Beijing Youth Daily, the school staff said that the matter is still under investigation and the rumor that the other eight roommates had secured their capital is untrue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
May 30, Beijing. Netizens posted a video showing a man staying in the business class cabin before the plane took off, claiming to take care of his master, and quarreling with the flight attendants.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, major media outlets have reported that Henan has experienced large-scale continuous rainy weather, which has seriously affected the maturity and harvest of wheat.
An old man planted four or five acres of wheat, and the yield is expected to be reduced by one third.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"Menstrual police"?
A Xiaohongshu netizen posted that after the marriage checkup, he received frequent inquiries from the so-called eugenics guidance or pregnancy investigation guidance department.
Subsequently, many netizens posted that they had the same experience. The questions included women's monthly menstrual conditions, menstrual time, and even home urine tests to check whether they were pregnant.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The school Youth League Committee released information about Hunan TV station recruiting interns. The internship period is three months, during which there is no salary, no food and accommodation, and you need to bring your own computer. Only an internship certificate is issued, which is jokingly called "recruiting black slaves" by netizens.
